text.more: The regional innovation system represented here results from a investigation for a master's thesis in Political Science at the University of Aveiro entitled - Innovation in Idanha-a-Nova, a social network analysis - by Alexandre Sampaio Rosa, defended in the year from 2021.
text.intro: Representative graph of the regional innovation system in Idanha-a-Nova, Portugal. Its actors and their relationships according to the data collected for the year 2019. The colors represent the geographic levels where each actor operates.
text.title: Regional Innovation System in Idanha-a-Nova, Portugal

legend.colorLabel: Geographic Operation: Light Green - Local / Dark Green - Regional / Purple - District / Blue - National / Orange - International
